{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall conduct audits of recipients of grants under this subtitle to prevent waste, fraud, and abuse of funds by grantees. The
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Inspector General of the Department of Justice

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall determine the appropriate number of grantees to be audited each year.

text.#text: A recipient of grant funds under this subtitle that is found to have an unresolved audit finding shall not be eligible to receive grant funds under this subtitle during the following 2 fiscal years.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall give priority to eligible entities that did not have an unresolved audit finding during the 3 fiscal years prior to submitting an application for a grant under this subtitle.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Office of Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention

text.#text: In awarding grants under this subtitle, the
deposit an amount equal to the grant funds that were improperly awarded to the grantee into the General Fund of the Treasury; and
seek to recoup the costs of the repayment to the fund from the grant recipient that was erroneously awarded grant funds.
